Actions.Name: Copy file
Actions.Description: Copy a file to a file path in Box.

Actions.Name: Delete file
Actions.Description: Deletes an existing file from Box.

Actions.Name: Extract archive to folder
Actions.Description: Extracts an archive file into a folder in Box (example: .zip).

Actions.Name: Get file content using id
Actions.Description: Retrieves the file content from Box using id.

Actions.Name: Get file content using path
Actions.Description: Retrieves the file contents from Box using path.

Actions.Name: Get file metadata using id
Actions.Description: Retrieves the file metadata from Box using file id.

Actions.Name: Get file metadata using path
Actions.Description: Retrieves the file metadata from Box using path.

Actions.Name: List files and folders in folder
Actions.Description: Lists the files and folders in a Box folder.

Actions.Name: List files and folders in root folder
Actions.Description: Lists the files and folders in the Box root folder.

Actions.Name: When a file is created [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow when a new file is created in a Box folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created.

Actions.Name: When a file is created (properties only) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use When a file is created (properties only) (V2) instead.
This operation triggers a flow when a new file is created in a folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created.

Actions.Name: When a file is created (properties only) (V2)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when a new file is created in a folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created. In case when 'Split On' option is turned off for Trigger->Settings successful trigger runs may produce empty array for 'List of Files' output.

Actions.Name: When a file is modified [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow when a file is modified in a Box folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created.

Actions.Name: When a file is modified (properties only)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when a file is modified in a folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created.

Actions.Name: When a file is modified (properties only) (V2) (Preview)

Actions.Name: Update file
Actions.Description: Updates an existing file in Box.
